verses.name: Mark 1:6
verses.text: And John was clothed with camel’s hair, and with a girdle of a skin about his loins; and he did eat locusts and wild honey;

verses.name: Mark 1:7
verses.text: And preached, saying, There cometh one mightier than I after me, the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose.

verses.name: Mark 1:8
verses.text: I indeed have baptized you with water: but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost.

verses.name: Mark 1:9
verses.text: And it came to pass in those days, that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee, and was baptized of John in Jordan.
